ChoosePage.title: Pick your mood and I'll tell you what movie to watch

subtitle.label: don't want to pick how you feel?, then

Neutral.title: Neutral
Neutral.prompt: I'm feeling pretty neutral right now. I want to watch a movie that keeps me in this balanced, chill mood, nothing too emotional or intense.

Sad.title: Sad
Sad.prompt: I'm feeling sad, and I want to watch a movie that deepens this emotion, something that allows me to fully feel and process my sadness.

Happy.title: Happy
Happy.prompt: I'm in a happy mood, and I want to keep the good vibes going. Show me a movie that will make me even happier!

Angry.title: Angry
Angry.prompt: I'm feeling angry and I want to channel this emotion. Show me a movie that matches my intensity and lets me stay in this mood.

Fearful.title: Fearful
Fearful.prompt: I'm feeling a bit fearful, and I want to dive deeper into that feeling. Show me a movie that will give me a thrill and keep me on edge.

Anxious.title: Anxious
Anxious.prompt: I'm feeling anxious, and I want a movie that lets me sit in that tension, something that heightens this anxious feeling.

Reflexive.title: Reflexive
Reflexive.prompt: I'm in a reflective mood, and I want to watch a movie that keeps me deep in thought, something introspective or philosophical.

Brain-dead.title: Brain-dead
Brain-dead.prompt: I feel totally brain-dead right now, and I want a movie that lets me stay in this state—something light, easy, and not too complicated.

Creative.title: Creative
Creative.prompt: I'm feeling creative, and I want a movie that will inspire me even more, something artistic or imaginative that fuels my creativity.

Romantic.title: Romantic
Romantic.prompt: I'm feeling romantic, and I want to watch a movie that enhances this mood, something that makes me feel even more in love.

Broken.title: Broken
Broken.prompt: I'm heartbroken right now, and I want to watch a movie that lets me stay in that feeling, something that resonates with my pain.

Adventurous.title: Adventurous
Adventurous.prompt: I'm feeling adventurous, and I want to watch a movie that makes me feel even more excited for adventure and exploration.

Nostalgic.title: Nostalgic
Nostalgic.prompt: I'm feeling nostalgic, and I want to watch a movie that takes me back, something that makes me feel even more connected to the past.

Astonished.title: Astonished
Astonished.prompt: I'm feeling amazed right now, and I want a movie that keeps me in that sense of wonder—something that makes me go 'wow!'

Hot.title: Hot
Hot.prompt: I'm feeling a little hot right now, and I want to see something that really turns me on, I want to see asses, naked women and everything very sexy.

MoneyMaker.title: MoneyMaker
MoneyMaker.prompt: I'm feeling ambitious and money-driven. Show me a movie that keeps me in that mindset, something about success and making it big.

Motivation.title: Motivation
Motivation.prompt: I'm feeling super motivated, and I want to watch a movie that pumps me up even more, something inspiring that keeps my drive alive.

Wow.title: Wow
Wow.prompt: I'm in a 'wow' mood and I want to keep it going. Show me something epic, mind-blowing, and visually stunning!
